@description.name: @description
@description.body: This class represents a scroll able pane. This means that this widget may contain content which is bigger than the available (inner) dimensions of this widget. The widget also offer methods to control the scrolling position. It can only have exactly one child.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired on resize of both the container or the content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired on scroll animation end invoked by 'scroll*' methods.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The horizontal scroll position

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The vertical scroll position

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Configures the content of the scroll pane. Replaces any existing child with the newly given one.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.Widget?null} The content widget of the pane
@param.description: The content widget of the pane

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Removes the given widget from the content. The pane is empty afterwards as only one child is supported by the pane.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.Widget?null} The content widget of the pane
@param.description: The content widget of the pane

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array containing the current content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for resize event of content and container

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for scroll event of content

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for appear event of content

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the top offset of the given item in relation to the inner height of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the top offset of the end of the given item in relation to the inner height of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the left offset of the given item in relation to the inner width of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the left offset of the end of the given item in relation to the inner width of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The size (identical with the preferred size) of the content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The maximum horizontal scroll position.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The maximum vertical scroll position.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the element's content to the given left coordinate

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Integer} The vertical position to scroll to.
@param.description: The vertical position to scroll to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number?} The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the element's content to the given top coordinate

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Integer} The horizontal position to scroll to.
@param.description: The horizontal position to scroll to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number?} The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the element's content horizontally by the given amount.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number?} The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the element's content vertically by the given amount.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number?} The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: If an scroll animation is running, it will be stopped with that method.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Transform property

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Transform property
